title: Adobe Photoshop CC 14.0 (Solution for Expiration) [ChingLiu]
description:
Alternative way to install Adobe Photoshop CC

If you have expiration problem, download and read ChingLiu.Install.Notes.nfo

0. * YOU DO NOT NEED TO UNINSTALL CC or CS6 (If you have)

** Close your internet connection. IMPORTANT

1. Install or Re-install the Adobe Photoshop CC 

2. Select "Install" - "Sign in" - "Connect Later"

3. Select your language. (You can not change it after installation)

4. Enter the serial included.

5. Select "Connect Later"

6. IMPORTANT : Use firewall to stop internet connection of the
application. Otherwise it will expire. 

7. Do not update. IMPORTANT
